snippet: The three Republican members of the Federal Election Commission object to a critical Op-Ed article by a Democratic member.
abstract: Letter from Federal Election Commission Chmn Lee E Goodman and commissioners Caroline C Hunter and Matthew S Petersen responds to April 3 Op-Ed article by FEC Vice Chairwoman Ann M Ravel criticizing their approach to campaign finance reform.
lead_paragraph: The three Republican members of the Federal Election Commission object to a critical Op-Ed article by a Democratic member.
